title: INDEX
content: Index Overview This project, New Siam 22th Century, or NS22, is a novel project involving Bangkok, Thailand, in a speculative 22th century setting involving mutual coexistence between humans and androids as the central theme. This also covers the idea of sapient AIs interweaving into human-driven society. Assume that the narrative starts on 2120s. Read more at nin827's Project NS22 Remarks for more details. (Coming soon) Contributors [!empty] TEST Lorem ipsum sit dolor amet.
